head.title: Boris Evieux
head.subtitle: Versatile coder - Problem Solver
head.quote: I'm proficient, project oriented and proactive. I make games. I love them

events.title: Baccalauréat
events.where: Lycée les trois sources, Valence, FR
events.moreInfo:
In France, the Baccalauréat sanctions the end of secondary education. You choose a spec, and a focus. For me it was sciences, focused on "SVT",, or "Life and Earth" : biology, geology.
You get a mention if you exceed certain marks : I got "Assez bien" : Honourable for a 12+ average grade.

events.title: DEUG LEA En-Es
events.where: Université Stendhal - Grenoble III, Valence, FR
events.info: General College degree, in Foreign Languages. Studied English and Spanish
events.moreInfo: A two-year course in foreign languages

events.title: DNTS Génie Logiciel
events.info: Professional College degree in Computer Sciences. That is roughly equivalent to a Bachelor's.
events.moreInfo: This is a one -year course spent 1/3 in College, and the other 2/3 working in a company as an apprentice.
